subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for the UI component.

subMembers.name: disabledExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the name of the data source item field whose value defines whether or not the corresponding UI component item is disabled.

subMembers.name: displayExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the data field whose values should be displayed.

subMembers.name: itemsExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies which data field contains nested items.

subMembers.name: keyExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies which data field provides keys for TreeView items.

subMembers.name: selectedExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the name of the data source item field whose value defines whether or not the corresponding UI component items is selected.
